survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners regarding their experiences with public charging stations, including ease of use, availability, and satisfaction levels, to help improve charging infrastructure.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?

questions.routing_logic: Respondent selects anything other than 'Never' in Q1
